programme.desc: A curious Sarawakian who wonders about questions that Sarawakians often wonder about history, culture and society. Join Husni as he goes on a quest to find the answers to Sarawaks untold stories.

programme.title: A Day With Champion S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Documentary of six athletes in variant of sports, at different stages in their careers. It lifts the curtain on how difficult and competitive it is to find place in international sports today.

programme.title: Kedey Kita S2 Ep12
programme.desc: Orden Syam will use a food truck to visit local entrepreneurs outside Kuching city, such as Sibu, Sarikei, Sri Aman, Kapit, and Betong, helping them promote their businesses and offer exclusive promotions.

programme.title: Just Wanna Dance S2 Ep11
programme.desc: 4 penari dari gaya tarian yang berbeza, latar belakang dan kumpulan umur berkumpul,meluaskan ufuk dengan mencabar diri untuk mengalami dan mempelajari genre tarian berbeza,tarian budaya dan tradisi Borneo

programme.title: Jom Camping Ep2
programme.desc: Program travelog yang meneroka pelbagai bentuk dan jenis perkhemahan berbeza selain berjalan ke lokasilokasi perkhemahan di negeri Sarawak bersama dua anak jati Sarawak, El Baharin dan Anaz Zawawi.

programme.title: Sarawak Panorama S2 Ep2
programme.desc: A country without a documentary is like a family without an album. Sarawak Panorama is the family album that my team and I whole heartedly and passionately dedicate to our beloved Sarawak.

programme.title: Design Nation Ep7
programme.desc: Design Nation is a serial TV magazine that documents the architecture of buildings by well-renowned architects that have won various awards locally and internationally.

programme.title: Pejalai Kamek Orang Ep12
programme.desc: Hosted and narrated by Tony Eusoff, traces locations & stories from people who have heard, experienced and witnessed events right from Brooke Era in 1841 leading up to Sarawaks independence in July 1974

programme.title: (L) Berita TVS@7
programme.desc: Berita TVS membawakan berita yang menyeluruh dan padat dengan perspektif yang lebihmenyegarkan.

programme.title: Rangkuman Persidangan DUN Sarawak Ep6
programme.desc: Imbasan mesyuarat pertama Penggal ke-3 DUN Sarawak ke-19, pembukaan,pengumuman agenda, perbahasan undang-undang,laporan jawatankuasa,sesi tanya jawab antara wakil DUN dan eksekutif kerajaan dan penutupan.

programme.title: Nature XCO & Downhill Ep6
programme.desc: Program pertandingan sukan basikal lasak yang dianjurkan oleh Broad Vision Solution Sdn.Bhd dengan kerjasama Persatuan Basikal Sarawak dan Sarawak Sports Cooperation bersama Kerajaan Negeri Sarawak.

programme.title: 3D Jobs Ep4
programme.desc: Aims to highlight and honor the unsung heroes of our communities who bravely perform challenging, hazardous, and dangerous jobs, showcasing their daily lives and their life stories beyond their work.

programme.desc: Berita TVS membawakan berita yang menyeluruh dan padat dengan perspektif yang lebihmenyegarkan.

Majikannya itu merupakan seorang yang memiliki sikap dan perangai yang membuatnya sentiasa berada dalam keadaan serba salah dan tertekan. Sikap majikannya yang tidak mahu membayar hutang, menuduhnya mengambil wang syarikat dan tidak membayar gaji menyebabkan dia nekad untuk berhenti kerja. Namun kisah berakhir apabila dia bersetuju untuk bekerja semula apabila majikannya memintanya menguruskan kerja-kerja kebajikan membaiki rumah anak yatim.

programme.title: Seutas Gelas Emas
programme.desc: Adam tinggal dengan ibunya di kampung. Berjawatan tinggi dan bergaji besar menyebabkan ibunya, Hasnah cukup bangga. Satu hari Bedah, penjual barang kemas, datang ke rumahnya untuk mengajak ke kenduri doa selamat. Di samping itu Bedah membuka juga barangan kemasnya. Hasnah tertarik pada seutas gelang tangan tetapi Adam tidak mengendahkannya. Adam jatuh hati pada Zaira, rakan sepejabatnya dan kemudiannya mereka berkahwin. Mulanya Zaira sangat rajin di dapur tapi bila bekerja semula, dia jadi lemak. Manisah dengan bangga menunjukkan gelangnya kepada Hasnah. Hasnah merasa sedih dan memalingkan muka tak sanggup melihat gelang yang sangat diingininya itu dipakai oleh besannya kerana Adam mampu membelikan gelang untuk mentuanya tapi bukan untuknya.

programme.title: Tukang Cukur Keliling Yang Selalu Mendapat Ujian Saat Hendak Mewujudkan Mimpinya Membangun Mushola
programme.desc: Mengikut pesanan terakhir dari isterinya yang telah meninggal, Encik Amin menyusul anak lelakinya, Fajar, yang tinggal di bandar. Di bandar, Fajar tinggal bersama isterinya, Lilis, dan anak lelakinya, Rangga. Fajar juga sering bertengkar dengan isterinya tentang perniagaan gunting rambutnya yang tidak berjalan lancar.

programme.title: Tajwid Cinta Ep132
programme.desc: Dafri baru saja kembali ke Indonesia untuk bertemu dengan Alina dan bertunang. Walau bagaimanapun, pertunangan itu terhalang kerana Nadia tidak suka dengan hubungan Dafri Bersama anak perempuannya, Alina. Nadia dengan sengaja menghantar Dafri untuk belajar di Turki agar Dafri jauh dari anak perempuannya. Selain itu, ayah Dafri meminta Dafri untuk berkahwin dengan Syifa, seorang wanita yang pertama kali Dafri temui. Pada ketika itu, Syifa gagal berkahwin kerana bakal suaminya, Ilham, tiba-tiba menghilangkan diri. Selepas berkahwin dengan Dafri, Syifa dan suaminya tinggal di Jakarta.

programme.title: D'Academy 5 Ep41
programme.desc: D'Academy kini kembali! D'Academy atau DA (singkatan dari Dangdut Academy) ialah pertunjukan bakat muzik dangdut yang pertama dan terbesar. Acara ini telah berjaya membangkitkan fenomena muzik dangdut, dan program ini telah menjadi salah satu pertunjukan pencarian bakat yang paling berjaya di Indonesia. Musim ini merupakan musim kelima dan diadakan buat kali pertama selepas tidak dihadirkan selama lima tahun.

programme.title: Karnaval SCTV 33 Ep15
programme.desc: Setiap tahun, karnival SCTV mempunyai tema yang berbeza. Karnival ini menyajikan acara muzik yang paling menarik dan menampilkan ramai musikus serta selebriti terkemuka tanah air.

programme.title: Rindu Bukan Rindu Ep47
programme.desc: Rindu Bukan Rindu mengisahkan kisah seorang wanita bernama Rindu yang merasa bertuah memiliki seorang lelaki bernama Devan. Kedua-duanya tinggal di Jepun dan menghabiskan masa bersama. Devan sentiasa berada di dekat Rindu, melindungi dan mencintainya. Hubungan di antara mereka terasa sangat rapat dan sempurna. Tetapi suatu hari, Rindu melihat Devan memegang tangan seorang wanita lain. Apakah yang terjadi di antara mereka?

programme.title: The Sultan S2 Ep26
programme.desc: The Sultan adalah rancangan bual bicara yang menampilkan dua pengacara yang kaya bak Sultan, iaitu Sultan Andara-Raffi Ahmad dan Sultan Bintaro-Andre Taulany dan ditemani oleh pengawal yang cantik dan tampan. Rancangan ini turut menampilkan bintang-bintang tetamu Indonesia yang terkenal.

programme.title: Rindu Bukan Rindu Ep47
programme.desc: Rindu Bukan Rindu mengisahkan kisah seorang wanita bernama Rindu yang merasa bertuah memiliki seorang lelaki bernama Devan. Kedua-duanya tinggal di Jepun dan menghabiskan masa bersama. Devan sentiasa berada di dekat Rindu, melindungi dan mencintainya. Hubungan di antara mereka terasa sangat rapat dan sempurna. Tetapi suatu hari, Rindu melihat Devan memegang tangan seorang wanita lain. Apakah yang terjadi di antara mereka?

programme.title: Berkah Dari Sebuah Kesabaran Penjual Nasi Gaul Yang Malang
programme.desc: Mengikut pesanan terakhir dari isterinya yang telah meninggal, Encik Amin menyusul anak lelakinya, Fajar, yang tinggal di bandar. Di bandar, Fajar tinggal bersama isterinya, Lilis, dan anak lelakinya, Rangga. Fajar juga sering bertengkar dengan isterinya tentang perniagaan gunting rambutnya yang tidak berjalan lancar.

programme.title: Tajwid Cinta Ep133
programme.desc: Dafri baru saja kembali ke Indonesia untuk bertemu dengan Alina dan bertunang. Walau bagaimanapun, pertunangan itu terhalang kerana Nadia tidak suka dengan hubungan Dafri Bersama anak perempuannya, Alina. Nadia dengan sengaja menghantar Dafri untuk belajar di Turki agar Dafri jauh dari anak perempuannya. Selain itu, ayah Dafri meminta Dafri untuk berkahwin dengan Syifa, seorang wanita yang pertama kali Dafri temui. Pada ketika itu, Syifa gagal berkahwin kerana bakal suaminya, Ilham, tiba-tiba menghilangkan diri. Selepas berkahwin dengan Dafri, Syifa dan suaminya tinggal di Jakarta.

programme.title: AKSI Indonesia Ep15
programme.desc: 24 Ustaz dan Ustazah dari pelbagai wilayah di Indonesia mengambil langkah untuk menang dengan melibatkan diri dalam pelbagai aktiviti Islamik yang menghiburkan dan bermakna. Saksikan dakwah mereka beraksi bersama para pengulas.

programme.title: The Sultan Empire Ep3
programme.desc: The Sultan Empire merupakan bentuk baharu Sultan, iaitu sebuah rancangan komedi sketsa bertemakan kerajaan yang dipenuhi dengan bintang jemputan.

programme.title: Doyan Makan Ep1
programme.desc: Doyan Makan menjemput penonton untuk mengikuti perjalanan dan pengalaman kulinari untuk makanan popular di kawasan tersebut, serta akan meninjau informasi tentang tempat, harga dan proses penghasilan makanan yang mereka nikmati.

programme.title: Rindu Bukan Rindu Ep48
programme.desc: Rindu Bukan Rindu mengisahkan kisah seorang wanita bernama Rindu yang merasa bertuah memiliki seorang lelaki bernama Devan. programme.title: Gadis Si Batu Menangis
programme.desc: Idrus dan Hesti, pasangan yang menjual gorengan di jalanan, bergelut untuk memenuhi permintaan puteri mereka, Mira. Tragedi berlaku apabila Idrus jatuh sakit dan meninggal dunia ketika menjual gorengan untuk memenuhi keinginan Mira. Beberapa tahun kemudian, Mira menjadi seorang gadis yang cantik dan berpendidikan, tetapi masih terus menuntut banyak dari Hesti, menyebabkan mereka akhirnya berpisah. Apa yang akan terjadi dalam kisah selanjutnya? Akankah Mira mencapai semua impiannya? Atau adakah dia akan menderita akibat derhaka kepada ibunya?

programme.title: Hidup Kadang Diatas Kadang Di Pelaminan
programme.desc: Seorang gadis cantik manis bernama Cinta mengalami masalah di mana bau badannya ketika berpeluh seperti jengkol. Cinta sering dibuli kerana masalah ini, malah ada gadis yang merasakan Cinta tidak layak untuk lelaki kacak. Namun, ironinya, Cinta sebenarnya menyukai seorang budak lelaki yang ternyata anak kepada musuh ketat ibunya, Dika.

programme.desc: Dafri baru saja kembali ke Indonesia untuk bertemu dengan Alina dan bertunang. programme.title: Indonesia Pintar S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Rancangan permainan terbesar di Indonesia yang mempertandingkan kecerdasan dan kecekapan 100 pelajar sekolah. Program ini diisi dengan pelbagai permainan menarik dan hadiah keseluruhan bernilai jutaan rupiah.

programme.title: The Thieves
programme.desc: Korean and Hong Kong thieves team up to heist a $20M worth diamond, while everyone has their own agenda to keep the diamond for themselves.

programme.title: Cobweb
programme.desc: Director Kim has completed filming Cobweb, but he decided to re-shoot the ending. With chaos and people don't understand the new ending, will Kim be able to complete his masterpiece?

programme.title: You Are My Sunshine
programme.desc: The marital bliss of Seok-jung and Eun-ha was threatened as Eun-ha was tested positive for HIV and met her abusive ex-husband again...

programme.title: The Glorious My Revenge
programme.desc: Detective Ryu lost his beloved son in a hit-and-run accident. As the statute of limitations passed without finding the criminal, he ran into the murderer of his son.

programme.title: Love Reset
programme.desc: A couple decide to divorce after two years of marriage. They revive a 30-day divorce settlement period from the court, but then they both lost memories after a car accident...

programme.title: The Battleship Island
programme.desc: During the colonial rule of Japan, around 400 Koreans are conscripted into slave labor on Hashima Island. As the islands dark secrets are revealed, the Korean labourers plot to escape.

programme.title: Long Live The King
programme.desc: Based on a popular web-based series, a mobster meets a headstrong lawyer who he falls in love with at first sight and ignites a desire to change for the better.

programme.title: Sympathy For Lady Vengeance
programme.desc: A woman planned revenge against her teacher after being wrongfully imprisoned for 13 years.

programme.title: Peninsula
programme.desc: Set four years after the zombie outbreak, a former soldier and his team return to the zombie-infested wastelands to retrieve a truck of money and try to escape from it alive.

programme.title: The Witness
programme.desc: One night at his apartment, a father witnesses a crime scene through his living room window and the killer starts to search for him and eliminate his only witness of that night.

programme.title: The Magician
programme.desc: A talented young magician falls for a princess betrothed to his former teacher, leading to a fierce showdown between the two powerful magicians.

programme.title: My Worst Neighbor
programme.desc: In a house with little soundproofing, a man and a woman living next door started a noise war. They then cohabitate through the wall, and catching up in subtle emotions...

programme.title: Mal-Mo-E: The Secret Mission
programme.desc: During the Japanese occupation in the 1940s, two men work together to secretly create a dictionary of the Korean language when the language was banned.

programme.title: Boomerang Family
programme.desc: A peaceful household is disturbed by the return of a womans three grown children one after the other.

programme.title: Unbowed
programme.desc: A math professor was not re-hired for pointing out errors in the university entrance exam. Losing the lawsuit against the university, he carries his crossbow to the judge for justice.

programme.title: Sleep
programme.desc: A man turns into a different person in sleep every night ever since he murmurs something strange, bringing fear and danger to his wife and their soon-to-be-born child...

programme.title: Emergency Declaration
programme.desc: Mysterious deaths on plane forced the pilot to call for an unconditional emergency landing.

programme.title: Missing You
programme.desc: When Hee-Joo was 7 years old, her father was murdered. The killer, Ki-Bum, was eventually arrested. Hee-Joo has waited patiently for Ki-Bum's release.

programme.title: The Thieves
programme.desc: Korean and Hong Kong thieves team up to heist a $20M worth diamond, while everyone has their own agenda to keep the diamond for themselves.

programme.title: Unstoppable
programme.desc: A once legendary gangster Dong-chul tries to settle down to enjoy an ordinary life with his wife, but things get hard when he continuously gets tricked into making bad business decisions.

programme.title: Countdown (2023)
programme.desc: When an Olympic gold medalist boxer met a young boxer who falls victim to match fixing, he vows to start a boxing team at the school he teaches at and give his student a shot at the nationals.

programme.title: The Hot-Blooded
programme.desc: 4 friends gave up on Taekwondo and part ways after being asked to lose on purpose in a trial. Years later, they decided to take on a local gang realizing their hometown is threatened.

programme.title: Da Capo
programme.desc: A frustrated songwriter met his old bandmate and a school band "Destroyer", who inspired him to complete an unfinished track...

programme.title: The Witness
programme.desc: One night at his apartment, a father witnesses a crime scene through his living room window and the killer starts to search for him and eliminate his only witness of that night.

programme.title: Waiting For Rain
programme.desc: An unmotivated student regains his passion for life after exchanging letters with his childhood friend and promise to meet if it rains on December 31st each year.

programme.title: Innocence
programme.desc: A hotshot lawyer uncovers the conspiracy of a small village while defending her estranged mother, who has Alzheimer's disease and accused of killing the attendees at her husbands funeral.

programme.title: Take Off
programme.desc: Rounding up five inexperienced athletes from a small Korean town with nothing to lose, they form the first Korean ski jump team in hope of winning gold.

programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep40
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep4861
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng and Genie Chuo, together with professional chef, James. programme.title: Way to Health (M) Ep281282
programme.desc: This show invites top medical professionals from different fields to answer questions from the audience. Approved by the medical world, this show is an influential, as well as reliable place to understand more about ones health.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep495
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: My Hero, My Daddy (M) Ep89
programme.desc: A fathers love for his daughters landed Jinfa Huang in battles against other men right within his family, as he found himself in conflict with his sons-in-law. His 3 daughters each possessed a distinct personality but were similarly headstrong and in romantic relationships that caused their fathers brows to crease. Tianlan, his eldest, was in love with Minglu Xu, Jinfas superior who never missed an opportunity to make life difficult for him; Tianhong, his second daughter, was drifting apart from him because of her husband; meanwhile, his youngest girl was challenging the taboo of a campus romance. How would Jinfa emerge victor in this fight to protect the 3 loves of his life?

programme.title: Battle Tour (M) Ep50
programme.desc: Brand new concept of a travelogue show! Hosts will be using a different perspectives and knowledge to show you the latest tourist spots to check in!

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep932933
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World (M) Ep720
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep496
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: A Hint of You (M) Ep2930
programme.desc: As the chef and owner of "All One Hundred" stir-fry restaurant, Ching-Yo Xia is determined to recreate the delicious fried rice her father used to make. To achieve this, she hones her culinary skills by learning from Master Chef Zhai-Yu Fu of a high-end teppanyaki restaurant. Despite her resilience and fearlessness in the face of challenges, Ching-Yo somehow manages to turn Culinary Prince Zhai-Yu's graceful life upside down!

programme.title: Cliff Walkers
programme.desc: The first spy thriller movie by famous Director Zhang Yi Mou, this film follows four Communist Party special agents who embark on a secret operation in the Japanese puppet state of Manchukuo in 1932. Sold out by a traitor, the agents, who split up into two teams, find themselves surrounded by threats on all sides. Can they complete their mission?

programme.title: The Silent War
programme.desc: After the Chinese Civil War, 701 Bureau continues to monitor the coded transmissions between rebel forces. When radio frequencies used by the opponent disappear suddenly, Agent Zhang asks Ho, a blind piano tuner with exceptional hearing, to help find the transmission signals. Can Ho find the missing signals and foil a possible assassination plot?

programme.title: Dearest Anita
programme.desc: Based on real events, the movie follows the footsteps of the fans of Hong Kong Canto-pop diva Anita Mui. After the death of the popstar, fans from different walks of life risk arrest to track down handwritten cards, letters and other possessions from Anita Mui to preserve their idols memory.

programme.title: The Brotherhood of Rebel
programme.desc: Chai, a triad member, helps his childhood friend Meow flee Hong Kong after discovering that Meow attempted to kill his triad boss. 17 years later, Chai becomes a key member of the triad. When he runs into Meow one day, he knows that his gang will kill Meow if they find him. Caught between triad and brotherhood, what will Chai choose?

programme.title: Kung Fu Dunk
programme.desc: Shi Jie grew up in a martial arts school and possesses an extraordinary shooting skill. Street hustler Chen Li sees his talent and arranges for him to join a university basketball team. With his kung fu dunking skill, Shi Jie manages to win all college basketball matches, bringing him wealth and also strengthening his relationship with Chen Li.

programme.title: The Grand Grandmaster
programme.desc: Ma Fei Lung, a Chinese martial arts grandmaster, lost everything after he is floored by a former female boxing champion, Chan Tsang. The relevant video was posted on social media and he became the laughing stock of everyone. To reclaim his reputation, Fei Lung challenges Chan Tsang to a rematch. Who will be the winner?

programme.title: Born to Fly
programme.desc: Lei Yu has officially become the new generation of Chinese test pilots after rounds of strict selection. Captain Zhang Ting leads Lei Yu and other pilots to test the latest fighter jets. Lei Yu keeps pushing the limits in each test flight in the hope of coming up with the perfect plane to ensure the safety of the fighter pilots.

programme.title: Let It Ghost
programme.desc: The movie consists of three urban ghost stories: when a film crew is haunted by a ghost, the director decides to cast her to play the ghost; when a taxi driver takes his girlfriend to a staycation, a horny ghost adds spice to it; a wandering child ghost refuses to leave a mall that is to be demolished, so the tenants help her to move on.

programme.title: Just 1 Day
programme.desc: Mosaic, an urban sketcher, is suffering from ALS and wants to create some fond memories as his condition worsens. When Mosaic reunites with his old classmate Angelfish, whom he has a crush on since primary school, he asks her to fulfill his one last wish by becoming his girlfriend for just one day. Will Angelfish say yes?

programme.title: Night and Fog
programme.desc: Following The Way We Are, this is based on a true story happening in Tin Shui Wai. It revolves around an older, unemployed Hong Kong man, his young Mainland wife and their two daughters. Their lives, unfortunately, are anything but easy, and the shocking conclusion raises issues about the plight of the socially deprived lower class.

programme.title: Love For All Seasons
programme.desc: May, acting leader of the Er Mei sect, cures the incurable illness of Tiger, a rich playboy. Under the threat of her senior, May seeks help from Tiger to experience heartbreak and master the "Heartbroken Sword" style, so as to defeat her senior and preserve Er Mei sect. Will this strange and long-winding relationship reach a happy ending?

programme.title: Detrimental
programme.desc: You Ji Ren is a blind man who works at a factory in an outlying island. When the factory is cut off from the outside world by a hurricane one day, a monster appears and turns whoever sees it into black shadows. As You cannot see the monster, he is able to help other coworkers leave safely and fight to kill the monster!

programme.title: From Vegas To Macau
programme.desc: Chow Yun Fat stars as "Magic Hands" Ken, a legendary gambling maestro who is forced out of retirement when his daughter's safety is compromised by an international gambling mafia. In order to save her, Ken and his new protg Cool must work together to expose the evil mastermind by challenging him to a high stakes head-to-head battle of cards.

programme.title: I Corrupt All Cops
programme.desc: Corruption was rampant in the Hong Kong Police Force in the early 1970s. Chief Inspector Lak launders drug money with three other police officers, and a young officer from the newly established Independent Commission Against Corruption division is determined to bring them down.

programme.title: Wu Xia
programme.desc: Martial artist Liu hides his identity and lives in a remote village with his wife Ah Yu and their two sons, but somehow gets embroiled in a bizarre murder case. Constable Xu is a kung fu fanatic, whose curiosity forces Liu into a death duel with the Sect Leader of the 72 Demons, and puts Lius family and homeland in a great danger...

programme.title: Trivisa
programme.desc: In the beginning of 1997, Hong Kong's three notorious thieves who have never met one another before appear in the same restaurant. This leads to a rumour that they are joining forces to pull off something big before the Handover, though this is not something that any of them is aware of.

programme.title: I'm Livin' It
programme.desc: Once a successful banker, Bowen now spends his nights in a 24-hour fast food joint where he meets a group of homeless people. Together they strive to get themselves out of rock bottom.

programme.title: Missbehavior
programme.desc: A group of friends who are formerly close but now somewhat estranged, unite to help one of their own who is in trouble at work. In this hilarious comedy, the friends must find a replacement bottle of breast milk before the end of the day as chaos breaks out!

programme.title: Wolf Hiding
programme.desc: A cold-blooded killer, Chen An vows to take revenge for her sister who was killed by a crime gang. Dealing with the police and the triad at the same time, a final battle between good and evil has just begun!

programme.title: Iron Monkey 2
programme.desc: Iron Monkey teams up with a band of revolutionaries to fight a malevolent gang of weapon smugglers and takes revenge for his friends death.

programme.title: The Fatal Raid
programme.desc: Twenty years after a deadly bloodbath between the Hong Kong Police and Macau gangsters, Madam Fong, the surviving team member, leads a new squad of four policewomen across borders to pursue young anarchists terrorizing Macau in a mission to protect the Hong Kong Polices Deputy Chief Commissioner.

programme.title: Push and Shove
programme.desc: A puppy gets gravely injured while defending them from the neighbor's large and aggressive Tibetan Mastiff. The arrogant owner of the Tibetan Mastiff, however, refuses to take responsibility, and the police aren't of much help since no people were hurt. When push comes to shove, the puppys owner vows to fight for justice for his dog.

programme.title: A Murder Erased
programme.desc: Police officer Choi is assigned to a death scene investigation where the deceased body had laid undiscovered for eight years. A prosecutor joins the investigation after Choi has identified the suspect, and finds Chois actions suspicious when all manner of inconsistencies come to light from his statement...

programme.title: Bodies at Rest
programme.desc: When three armed criminals barge into a morgue, a forensic doctor and his student must fight with their lives to stop the criminals from obtaining a bullet from inside a corpse that is a key piece of evidence in a deadly crime.

programme.title: Only Cloud Knows
programme.desc: This romantic drama is based on the story of a real-life couple. It follows a grieving husband as he journeys to places of significance to his beloved dead wife across their New Zealand homeland.

programme.title: Black Ransom
programme.desc: Mann, an accomplished police officer, has allowed his career to wane after his wife was murdered by the mafia. However, Mann is forced to return to his former glory when he is assigned to investigate a former police inspector suspected to be kidnapping mafia bosses and demanding ransoms in exchange for their lives.

programme.title: Song of Spring
programme.desc: An 85-year-old mother lives with her 65-year-old daughter who is suffering from Alzheimer's disease, causing her to suffer a decline in memory, mental confusion and disorientation. Though the elderly mother has to shoulder the burden of a caregiver, she still wants to be with her daughter forever.

programme.title: City Under Siege
programme.desc: When circus clown Sunny gets transformed into a super-powered mutant, he finds himself pitted against his fellow circus performers who were altered in the same accident, and who are now using their powers to wreak havoc around the city.

programme.title: The New Legend of Shaolin
programme.desc: A Shaolin disciple Hong Xi Guan is tasked to escort the five young shaolin legends who have treasure maps tattooed on their backs to the base of the Anti-Qing Society. They are targeted and hunted by an assassin sent by the Qing government. Can Hong finally keep them safe and complete his mission?

programme.title: Mama's Affair
programme.desc: Former talent manager Mei Fung stays home to take care of her husband and son after retirement. She decides to re-enter the entertainment business to find her value in life, and successfully transforms a local restaurant delivery boy, Fong Ching, into a young pop idol. This makes her teenage son, Jonathan, intensely jealous of Fong Ching.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon II: Wild Wild Bunch
programme.desc: Starring four Hong Kong Film Awards Best Actors, Simon Yam, Louis Koo, Tony Leung Ka Fai and Gordon Lam, this action-thriller follows the real-life kidnapping events that terrorized Hong Kongs elite in the 1990s by serial billionaire-kidnapper Logan and his gang.

programme.title: Chilli Laugh Story
programme.desc: Coba is forced to work at home during COVID-19 and fights with his family every day. He decides to turn his mothers chilli sauce into a trendy commodity to keep his family occupied. With his mother, father and aunt making the chilli sauce together, the family sells it online and the business grows beyond their imagination.

programme.title: My Country, My Parents
programme.desc: Set in 4 different eras in China, the 4-part anthology about home and country is directed by Wu Jing, Zhang Zi Yi, Xu Zheng and Shen Teng, who also star in their own story. The movie depicts how the fathers forge ahead through the struggle of times, defending strong family ties and passing on the fighting spirit through generations.

programme.title: The Flag Of Iron
programme.desc: When super director Chang Cheh found new talent and blood with "The Five Venoms" actors, most of which were trained in the highly acrobatic Chinese opera and well versed with exotic martial arts weapons, this created a new spark for his use of bizarre weapons in his films. The Flag Of Iron is one of 20 movies that he directed featuring the utterly flabbergasting and physically exhausting action bits created by these five dudes. You have the good guys from the righteous clan versus the bad guys from the villainous clan and it's so filled with "don't-blink-or-you-will-miss-something" gags, you will need to watch it over and over again so you can see the things you missed.

programme.title: Na Cha The Great
programme.desc: Adapted from a chapter of the classic Chinese legend Investiture of the Gods, this is the story of Na Cha set 3000 years ago. After Na Cha sacrificed his life to save his parents, he is reincarnated with his spirit embodied in a lotus flower and is armed with two magic weapons to save the people from their despotic emperor.

programme.title: New Tales Of The Flying Fox
programme.desc: In a great rendition of The Silver Fox and Legend of the Fox comes this exciting adventure, where the only thing between the clan leaders and certain death is Hui Ying-hung.

programme.title: The Amorous Lotus Pan
programme.desc: Adapted from the renowned Chinese novel, The Water Margin, this is the story of a poor and beautiful girl Lotus Pan, who is raped by her master and had to be married off to a midget who treats her badly. Lost and lonely, Pan unwittingly becomes a pawn in the game of lust between her husbands playboy brother Wu Song, and a murderous man Men Ching.

programme.title: Raw Courage
programme.desc: After the Ming Emperor is overthrown and his infant son was put in the care of the Black Dragon Society, a traitorous martial arts clan attacks the society, forcing an inexperienced pair of swordsman and swordswoman to flee with the infant. Their journey to deliver the infant to safety is filled with dangers that would require help from other allies

programme.title: The Snake Prince
programme.desc: The Snake Prince lives on the Snake Mountain of Kwangsi with other snakes and they have lived peacefully with humans for a thousand years. All things change however, when the Snake Prince falls in love with one of the three beauties performing a sensual rain dance in the nearby village one day, and decides to marry her at all costs...

programme.title: Two Champions Of Shaolin
programme.desc: Set in the Qing Dynasty, the Shaolin clan wants to overthrow Qing and restore the Ming Dynasty, while the Wudang clan is backed by the Qing government. The two renowned clans eventually set themselves up against each other, and a series of vicious fighting has just begun

programme.title: Twinkle Twinkle Little Star
programme.desc: A beautiful but ignorant woman is abducted by aliens but nobody believes her close encounter. While planning a suicide to prove herself, she meets a failed detective who is also planning his suicide. They change their minds about dying after finding each other and start to encounter bizarre adventures, before falling in love with each other.

programme.title: The Young Avenger
programme.desc: Liu seeks out Li to avenge his brothers death and loses an arm in the fight, vowing revenge ten years later. Li dies after asking his sister to send his daughter Bao Zhu to learn the Dragon Sword skill to avenge his death. Bao Zhu grows up to become a skilled swordswoman and meets Liu for the planned duel with her cousin Chen. Can she defeat Liu?

programme.title: The Happiest Moment
programme.desc: This erotic comedy anthology features three stories about an old man who dies from an overdose of virility pills, a cop who goes on the run after extorting money from a hooker, and a barber's apprentice who encounters a lively corpse in a night vigil. Through playing all these characters, Michael Hui proves himself as a genius of Hong Kong comedy.

programme.title: The Big Sting
programme.desc: Three buddies find a rare artifact known as the Double-Faced God but are poisoned by Lady Wu who steals the treasure from them. Before they die, they get their wives to promise to train their children to take back what is rightfully theirs. These kids grow up to exact a vengeance that turns out to be more hilarious than horrific in this comedy.

programme.title: Men From The Gutter
programme.desc: Two very different cops are out to capture a local drug boss. In this sizzling crime thriller, the two cops go about doing their jobs differently - one does everything to the letter of the law and the other just doing whatever it takes to solve crime.

programme.title: A Place To Call Home
programme.desc: Li Ching, star of Sweet is Revenge, plays one of three daughters, whose life is turned upside down when she discovers she is adopted. But things get even worse when she goes in search of her real mother. Finally, after what is almost a double tragedy, she realizes what so many knew all along: There's no place like home.

programme.title: Brothers Five
programme.desc: The five Kao brothers, separated since birth, are unaware that the master of Teng Lung Manor has killed their father. All five however, vow to defeat the vicious gangsters at the manor due to their bullying ways. After reuniting and with much discipline and hard work, the Kaos are prepared to face Lung and his gang.

programme.title: Between Tears And Smiles
programme.desc: Fan Jia Shu is a kind-hearted student who is smitten with Shen, a heart-rending love song singer. However, he is not the only one who has eyes for Shen. The Generals henchmen are also determined to present the songstress to their superior as a gift. Fan receives help from an unexpected person just in time to save the woman he loves.

programme.title: Shadow Girl
programme.desc: A young swordswoman becomes invisible during the day and a monster at night after taking her grandmas pill. She ruined the wedding of a bandit chiefs daughter using her powers and is hunted down by them for revenge. Will she escape the hunt?

programme.title: Love Parade
programme.desc: Fashion designer Shi asks his friend Mui to comment on his new design but is angered by her criticism. When Mui asks him to design a gown for her to attend a gala event, Shi takes revenge by making a clown costume instead. Seeing Muis embarrassment, Shi feels guilty and apologizes to her, before they fall in love

programme.title: House Of Traps
programme.desc: It all started with THE FIVE VENOMS, the internationally loved kung-fu thriller which introduced director Chang Cheh's recurring cast of martial arts masters. It continued through more than a dozen high-flying, bloody good entertainments featuring the same action actors in pairs, trios, quartets, and, most memorably, quintets. While this is considered the last official "Venoms" movie, what a film it is. The title does not lie: an evil prince has secreted stolen imperial treasures in a building that practically bristles with booby-trapped blades. Bodies are pierced, limbs are cut off, and there's one plasma-spurting attack after another as heroes and rogues alike try to solve the secrets of the hell house. The core Venoms themselves choreograph the gory fun in this fond farewell to their worldwide film series sensation.

programme.title: Mist Over Dream Lake
programme.desc: A young girl Chen is sent away by her parents who are going through divorce, to stay with the Changs. On the Changs farm, she meets their two sons, the youngest daughter and a young artist, and spends a summer with them that she will never forget.

programme.title: The Golden Seal
programme.desc: Dai Tian Chou practices martial arts since young so he can avenge his fathers death. He meets Wu Xiao Yan who is disguised as a man one day and is suddenly beaten by a group of gangsters. Wu begs her father to allow her to take Dai back home to recover. Little does Dai know this is his chance to take revenge.

programme.title: Spring Blossoms
programme.desc: Some of Shaw Brothers' biggest female stars of the 1970s share the screen in this tale of young love and interfering parents, starring Lily Li, Shu Pei Pei and Essie Lin Chia.

programme.title: Five Superfighters
programme.desc: A kung fu master and his three students lost everything after they are floored by a bully. To take revenge, the students find ways to learn from other kung fu masters and come back six months later to have a rematch with the bully on their masters birthday.

programme.title: The Grand Substitution
programme.desc: In this Opera epic, a loyal Imperial Court servant gives up his own newborn son to save the prince from an evil official.

programme.title: The Emperor And His Brother
programme.desc: The Emperor Qianlong is not the legitimate successor to the throne at birth, but he only learns the truth when two senior members of a subversive anti-government secret organisation contact him years later. As it happens, the chef of this organisation is Qianlongs younger brother and they must now confront each other in opposing roles

programme.title: Fangs Of The Cobra
programme.desc: Incredibly, the title serpent is not a harbinger of horror, but actually the film's hero. This virtuous viper sniffs out bombs, fights gangs, battles a baby-killing rodent and even takes on a duplicitous woman. This one-of-a-kind thriller will be applauded by reptile fans everywhere.

programme.title: The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This side-splitting comedy sees naive Ah Niu headed to Hong Kong, where he is repeatedly exploited and taken advantage of, and eventually finds himself arrested and imprisoned! Can he survive difficult times and finally overcome adversity?

programme.title: My Son
programme.desc: Kuo, a polices son, blames his father for his mothers death. He has no job, spends time in night clubs and always gets into fights. One night, Kuo rescues Mei from being raped and they become friends. Kuo wants to support Mei and her family so he goes gambling hoping to gain more money but bad luck seems to be following them with tragic outcomes.

programme.title: Legendary Weapons Of China
programme.desc: Lei Kung, the leader of the Boxer Clan in Yunnan, dissolves the clan to save his disciples before going into self-exile. The Clan sends various assassins to kill him but failed. They then assigned Kungs brother Yong to find and kill Kung, leading to a battle between the two brothers.

programme.title: Fast Fingers
programme.desc: After his release from prison, Uncle Bill returns to make a fortune with his past thieving partners. They continue to prey on the unsuspecting public, but are closely watched by the upright police chief, who happens to be the boyfriend of one of Uncle Bills nieces!

programme.title: Rivals Of Kung Fu
programme.desc: Shen and Wong Fei Hungs relationship turns sour, and Shen frames Wong and his disciple for murder. They are saved by a businessman Zhou, but Wong must win the Lion Dance Trophy to return Zhous favour. Can Wong Fei Hung defeat all skilled martial artists and complete his mission?

programme.title: Lover'S Rock
programme.desc: Pan Lei, winner the China Literary Award for three consecutive years, wrote and directed this film about the lives and loves of a fishing village. It starred the glorious Cheng Pei-pei in her first film as a woman (she had debuted in a mans role), and her much-lauded performance won her the prestigious Golden Accolade Award from the International Association Of Independent Producers a first for any Asian woman.

programme.title: Swordsman And Enchantress
programme.desc: The story happens in a martial arts world where everyone tries to obtain the "Deer Sword". Lian's wife is wounded in an ambush and his rival Xiao saves her. They escape to Xiaos home and he treats her poisonous wound. This leads Lian to suspect his wifes faithfulness and results in several blood-splattering duels with Xiao.

programme.title: The Shadow Boxing
programme.desc: Chan and his apprentice Fan transport vampires for a living. In their most recent job, they are hired to transport nine zombies at one go. When two of them hopped away, it is revealed that one of them is actually a man in disguise trying to escape from his enemies. It turns out that the fake zombie and Chan are both martial arts experts!

programme.title: Holy Flame Of The Martial World
programme.desc: This internationally popular tale of a brother and sister, seeking vengeance for the death of their parents through using the mythical yin/yang Holy Flame kung-fu technique. It's an outstanding epic choreographed and co-starring lead "Venom" Kuo Chue (aka. Philip Kwok).

programme.title: The Lark
programme.desc: Sixties pop star Carrie Ku plays the "Little Lark" in this romantic-drama of mistaken identity that is a treasure trove of some of the most popular Mandarin songs of all time.

programme.desc: Tamil Action drama film, Starring - Mahesh Babu, Keerthy Suresh & Samuthirakani

programme.desc: Tamil sports action drama film, Starring - M. Sasikumar, Parvathy Arun, J. D. Chakravarthy & Balaji Sakthivel

programme.title: The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon S11 Ep126
programme.desc: Emmy and Grammy Award-winning comedian Jimmy Fallon brings his unique high-energy comedy to the storied 60-year NBC franchise with his welcoming interview style, love of audience participation, spot-on impersonations and innovative sketches.

programme.title: Late Night With Seth Meyers S11 Ep97
programme.desc: Late Night with Seth Meyers is executive produced by the Emmy Award-winning Lorne Michaels and is home to A-list celebrity guests, memorable comedy and the best in musical talent.

programme.title: Framed By My Sister
programme.desc: The families of twin sisters are infiltrated by a mysterious triplet, who was separated from them at birth by their adopted mother. She frames one of the twins for murdering the other's husband and then assumes the identity of the widow. Can she succeed?

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown S3 Ep7
programme.desc: Haute Chocolate - The final four bakers are in for a big (and small) surprise as they must master the macaron and its larger cousin the macaronade. With the finale one challenge away, fashion becomes their passion as the bakers look to the runway for their dessert.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown S3 Ep8
programme.desc: The Finale: Once Upon a Baker... - In the season finale, the home bakers take on the most demanding bake of the entire competition: telling their baking story through four delectable dessert chapters.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown S4 Ep1
programme.desc: Let The Games Begin! - Ten home bakers enter the kitchen and are tasked with creating a chocolate Tic Tac Toe board. In the Elimination Challenge, the bakers set a scrumptious scene by delivering a cake diorama.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown S4 Ep2
programme.desc: Think Outside the Bar - The remaining nine bakers must think beyond the bar as they create a nougat-filled chocolate confection in a surprising shape; the bakers aim to please in the elimination challenge with a dessert that pairs chocolate with cheese.

programme.title: First Ladies Revealed Ep1
programme.desc: The Power Of Style - Dolley Madison. Jackie Kennedy. Nancy Reagan. Join us as we examine their days in the White House and how they defined their position through a mix of diplomacy, glamour, and grit. See how these stylish women left their mark on American history.

programme.title: First Ladies Revealed Ep2
programme.desc: Twists Of Fate - Edith Roosevelt, Lady Bird Johnson, and Betty Ford entered the White House under stressful conditions. Whether adding the West Wing or championing women's rights, these three first ladies embraced a job they never expected to hold.

programme.title: First Ladies Revealed Ep3
programme.desc: In Times Of War - Join us as we celebrate Mary Todd Lincoln, Eleanor Roosevelt, and Laura Bushfirst ladies who served their country at a time when it was most needed, and helped America cope through times of tragedy and trauma.

programme.title: First Ladies Revealed Ep4
programme.desc: Trailblazers - Some first ladies are determined to blaze a trail, not just for future first ladies but for women everywhere. Meet two first ladies who stepped out of their husbands' shadows and made a major difference in their own right.

programme.title: The First Lady Ep1
programme.desc: That White House - Eleanor, Betty and Michelle enter new political roles. Series premiere.

programme.title: The First Lady Ep2
programme.desc: Voices Carry - Eleanor, Betty and Michelle face challenges in their first days in office.

programme.title: The First Lady Ep3
programme.desc: Please Allow Me - Eleanor, Betty and Michelle come of age and meet their future husbands.

programme.title: The First Lady Ep4
programme.desc: Cracked Pot - Eleanor, Betty and Michelle navigate the rising careers of their husbands.

programme.title: The First Lady Ep5
programme.desc: See Saw - Eleanor, Betty and Michelle advocate for their own issues as First Lady.

programme.title: The First Lady Ep6
programme.desc: Shout Out - Eleanor, Betty and Michelles daring stances put them in the spotlight.

programme.title: The First Lady Ep7
programme.desc: Nadir - Eleanor, Betty and Michelle battle public and personal hardships.

programme.title: The First Lady Ep8
programme.desc: Punch Perfect - Eleanor forces Franklins hand in assisting Jewish refugees fleeing Nazi Germany. While Jerry spends his retirement on the road, Betty seeks out new party companions at home. Despite Baracks hesitations, Michelle directly speaks out about race.

programme.title: The First Lady Ep9
programme.desc: Rift - Eleanor rallies the country as the US enters World War II. After Bettys addiction spirals, Jerry and her family intervene. Michelle joins Hillary Clinton on the 2016 presidential campaign trail to advocate for the dignity of American women.

programme.title: The First Lady Ep10
programme.desc: Victory Dance - Franklin gifts Eleanor the charter for the League of Nations. After rehab, Betty vows to help others with addiction problems. Barack and Michelle prepare to leave the White House, to continue making a difference in the world. Season finale.

programme.title: Spider-Man: Into The Spider-Verse

programme.title: Where the Wild Men Are with Ben Fogle S10 Ep10
programme.desc: Thailand - Ben meets Niall, who rescues and cares for street dogs in Koh Samui.

programme.title: Iceland with Alexander Armstrong S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Alexander Armstrong continues his journey around Iceland with a visit to a glacier, a trip to the island of Heimay which was nearly destroyed by a volcanic eruption in the 1970s, a walk on the most dangerous beach in the country and a night in a capsule hotel.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 - Chinga the Lion Cub Ep2
programme.desc: In South Africas Greater Kruger Park, A little cub called Chiga has been born into family of hunters - the Mala Mala lion pride. Under the guidance of a devoted father, a fierce mother, and a playful sister, Chiga finds her place in the pride.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder 1 - Choices Ep3
programme.desc: Learn how Ningaloos conservation miracle could inspire humans to pull the planet back from the brink of climatic destruction. Visit an abandoned whaling station and other ruins that show we have the tools, if only we can find the will to change.

programme.title: How the Wild Things Sleep
programme.desc: There is an endless variety of sleep-strategies among animals, yet it seems a universal behavior. But why bother with sleep at all? How do animals cope without sleep or the dangers of being unconscious in the wild? Just some of the baffling questions that lead through How the Wild Things Sleep.

programme.title: Deep Dive Australia 1 - Tropical Shores Ep1
programme.desc: Explore the shores of the Northern Territory and the abundant waters of the Great Barrier Reef. Face flooded roads, hungry saltwater crocs, and killer jellyfish as Lizzie investigates why so many strange, deadly creatures make this remote area home.

programme.title: Deep Dive Australia 1 - The Cool South Ep2
programme.desc: Say goodbye to the tropics and dip into cool southern-coast waters. Come face to face with majestic grey nurse sharks, shape-shifting cuttlefish, and huge blue whales; play with penguins and sea lions; and learn why these seas are brimming with life.

programme.title: Attack and Defend 1 - Insect Eaters Ep3
programme.desc: Every predator needs a speciality - and these tenacious insect-eaters have a great one. They evolved to hunt a virtually unlimited food source: bugs. With highly-developed hunting skills, they source, kill and consume with great success.

programme.title: Ocean Parks 1 - Bahamas Exuma Cays Ep5
programme.desc: The Exuma Cays are a remote wonder: hundreds of tiny islands extending south from the Bahamian Capital of Nassau. In the 1950s, developers dreamed of developing this pristine, and largely unexplored region. But before construction could begin, the Bahamian government supported an expedition to chart the cays. They liked what they saw, and in 1959 established the Bahamas National Trust, creating the Bahamas first Ocean Park.

programme.title: Into the Wild India 1 - Temple Monkeys on the Run Ep8
programme.desc: Nestled on the edge of the ancient city of Jodhpur, the luxurious Temple Gardens are home to a huge troop of Hanuman Langurs, who enjoy a peaceful life of bounty. But the troop has a strict hierarchy.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 - Lyca the Painted Wolf Ep1
programme.desc: In central Namibia, a pack of painted wolves roams the arid land. Amid threats from lions and drought, a plucky little pup called Lyca has to grow up fast, learn the skills of a hunter, and find her place as member of the pack.

programme.title: Wild Latin America 1 - Humpback Birth of a Giant Ep1
programme.desc: Follow the first months of a newborn humpback whales life in the waters off the Pacific Coast of Columbia. See how his mother nurtures him through sickness, supports his body, protects him under attack, and prepares him for an epic journey.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder 1 - Choices Ep3
programme.desc: Learn how Ningaloos conservation miracle could inspire humans to pull the planet back from the brink of climatic destruction. Visit an abandoned whaling station and other ruins that show we have the tools, if only we can find the will to change.

programme.title: How the Wild Things Sleep

How do animals cope without sleep or the dangers of being unconscious in the wild? Just some of the baffling questions that lead through How the Wild Things Sleep.

They liked what they saw, and in 1959 established the Bahamas National Trust, creating the Bahamas first Ocean Park.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 12 Ep12
programme.desc: Check in with the centres resident turkey vulture, whos ready for release and in search of a flock. While Nathalie and her team rush to secure funding for a new facility, the medical team is baffled by a toad who has mysteriously taken ill.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 - Lyca the Painted Wolf Ep1
programme.desc: In central Namibia, a pack of painted wolves roams the arid land. Amid threats from lions and drought, a plucky little pup called Lyca has to grow up fast, learn the skills of a hunter, and find her place as member of the pack.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 - Chinga the Lion Cub Ep2
programme.desc: In South Africas Greater Kruger Park, A little cub called Chiga has been born into family of hunters - the Mala Mala lion pride. Under the guidance of a devoted father, a fierce mother, and a playful sister, Chiga finds her place in the pride.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder 1 - Choices Ep3
programme.desc: Learn how Ningaloos conservation miracle could inspire humans to pull the planet back from the brink of climatic destruction. Visit an abandoned whaling station and other ruins that show we have the tools, if only we can find the will to change.

programme.title: How the Wild Things Sleep

How do animals cope without sleep or the dangers of being unconscious in the wild? Just some of the baffling questions that lead through How the Wild Things Sleep.

programme.title: Deep Dive Australia 1 - Tropical Shores Ep1
programme.desc: Explore the shores of the Northern Territory and the abundant waters of the Great Barrier Reef. Face flooded roads, hungry saltwater crocs, and killer jellyfish as Lizzie investigates why so many strange, deadly creatures make this remote area home.

programme.title: Deep Dive Australia 1 - The Cool South Ep2
programme.desc: Say goodbye to the tropics and dip into cool southern-coast waters. Come face to face with majestic grey nurse sharks, shape-shifting cuttlefish, and huge blue whales; play with penguins and sea lions; and learn why these seas are brimming with life.

programme.title: Attack and Defend 1 - Cold-Blooded Killers Ep4
programme.desc: From our point of view, cold-blooded predators are brutal, savvy, programmed killers. But from their point of view, its just another day at the butchers counter. These are some of the most fearsome predators on Earth.

programme.title: Baby Animals 2 - Surrogate Families Ep1
programme.desc: Most baby animals have a mother to raise them and show them how to succeed in the wild. Mammals are particularly dependent on their moms. In this episode of Baby Animals well meet four different species of babies that are being raised by humans and who have surrogate families.

programme.title: Land of Primates 1 - Lemurs of Anja Mountain Ep1
programme.desc: Millions of years ago, castaway creatures found themselves stranded on Madagascars rugged shores. Isolated from the mainland, the newcomers were left to evolve. This is a magical world of rare and unique creatures perfectly adapted to their tropical hideaway.

programme.title: Land of Primates 1 - Wanderers of the Lost Forest Ep3
programme.desc: This story takes place in the town of Hogsback, a tiny village on the top of a mountain in the Eastern Cape of South Africa. Due to habitat loss and fragmentation, the Samango monkeys and Cape Parrots of the nearby forests have been forced to search for food outside of their natural habitats and venture into the town on a daily basis.

programme.title: Land of Primates 1 - The Geladas of Ethiopia Ep5
programme.desc: Geladas are only found among the peaks and plateaus of Ethiopias Simien Mountains, an ancient range of incredible beauty and biodiversity. We follow the Mountain Band of Geladas as they make their daily migration from the cliff edge to the mountaintop.

programme.title: Land of Primates 1 - Africa's Baboons Ep7
programme.desc: The baboon is one of the worlds most successful and dominant primates. Ranging throughout Africa, we explore how these fascinating animals have adapted to thrive in mountains, deserts, along the shores of acidic lakes, and even on the edge of a mighty ocean.

programme.title: Evolution Earth 1 - Earth Ep1
programme.desc: Travel to the ends of the Earth, where a drama is unfolding in real time. Meet animals, from tiny butterflies to huge humpback whales, that are acting as sentinels, adapting their behaviour, and helping us unlock the riddles of our changing planet.

programme.title: Evolution Earth 1 - Islands Ep2
programme.desc: Find out why islands are like mini-Earths where evolution happens before your eyes. Journey from the Galpagos to Antarctica to see how sea lions, finches, crickets, monkeys and other wildlife are finding surprising solutions to climatic problems.

programme.title: Evolution Earth 1 - Heat Ep3
programme.desc: Go to extremes, from the Sahara to the outback, where animals are teaching us how to survive in our heating world. Shelter in caves with chimps, see camels sip salt water, and listen as zebra finches sing to their eggs to make their chicks smaller.

programme.title: Evolution Earth 1 - Ice Ep4
programme.desc: Trek to the planets quickly melting poles, where animals are giving scientists clues about our future existence. Learn how the movements of polar bears, penguins, and other arctic creatures could help humans map (and prevent) global warming.

programme.title: Kingdom of the Tide
programme.desc: Low tide exposes a band of shore called the intertidal zone. Its a place of stunning extremes, attacked by hurricane force waves and exposed to baking heat. Creatures here have evolved in countless bizarre ways. Scientists explore this alien realm.

programme.title: Planet Shark 1 - Ultimate Predator Ep1
programme.desc: Stalk the seas with sharks as they hunt using heightened senses and killer instincts. Watch a whitetip reef shark put its electrical sensors to work finding its preys heartbeat, and the pelagic thresher shark stun its quarry with its whiplike tail.

programme.title: Attack and Defend 1 - Cold-Blooded Killers Ep4
programme.desc: From our point of view, cold-blooded predators are brutal, savvy, programmed killers. But from their point of view, its just another day at the butchers counter. These are some of the most fearsome predators on Earth.

programme.title: Land of Primates 1 - Lemurs of Anja Mountain Ep1
programme.desc: Millions of years ago, castaway creatures found themselves stranded on Madagascars rugged shores. Isolated from the mainland, the newcomers were left to evolve. This is a magical world of rare and unique creatures perfectly adapted to their tropical hideaway.

programme.title: Land of Primates 1 - Wanderers of the Lost Forest Ep3
programme.desc: This story takes place in the town of Hogsback, a tiny village on the top of a mountain in the Eastern Cape of South Africa. Due to habitat loss and fragmentation, the Samango monkeys and Cape Parrots of the nearby forests have been forced to search for food outside of their natural habitats and venture into the town on a daily basis.

programme.title: Evolution Earth 1 - Earth Ep1
programme.desc: Travel to the ends of the Earth, where a drama is unfolding in real time. Meet animals, from tiny butterflies to huge humpback whales, that are acting as sentinels, adapting their behaviour, and helping us unlock the riddles of our changing planet.

programme.title: After the Wildfires
programme.desc: Examine fires pivotal role in shaping Australias natural world. Tour the devastation left by 2020s brutal bush-fire season, learn how climate change fuelled this watershed event, and chart the long-term recovery of the continents wildlife.

programme.title: Evolution Earth 1 - Heat Ep3
programme.desc: Go to extremes, from the Sahara to the outback, where animals are teaching us how to survive in our heating world. Shelter in caves with chimps, see camels sip salt water, and listen as zebra finches sing to their eggs to make their chicks smaller.

programme.title: Evolution Earth 1 - Ice Ep4
programme.desc: Trek to the planets quickly melting poles, where animals are giving scientists clues about our future existence. Learn how the movements of polar bears, penguins, and other arctic creatures could help humans map (and prevent) global warming.

programme.title: Kingdom of the Tide
programme.desc: Low tide exposes a band of shore called the intertidal zone. Its a place of stunning extremes, attacked by hurricane force waves and exposed to baking heat. Creatures here have evolved in countless bizarre ways. Scientists explore this alien realm.

programme.title: Planet Shark 1 - Ultimate Predator Ep1
programme.desc: Stalk the seas with sharks as they hunt using heightened senses and killer instincts. Watch a whitetip reef shark put its electrical sensors to work finding its preys heartbeat, and the pelagic thresher shark stun its quarry with its whiplike tail.

programme.title: Land of Primates 1 - The Geladas of Ethiopia Ep5
programme.desc: Geladas are only found among the peaks and plateaus of Ethiopias Simien Mountains, an ancient range of incredible beauty and biodiversity. We follow the Mountain Band of Geladas as they make their daily migration from the cliff edge to the mountaintop.

programme.title: Baby Animals 2 - Surrogate Families Ep1
programme.desc: Most baby animals have a mother to raise them and show them how to succeed in the wild. Mammals are particularly dependent on their moms. In this episode of Baby Animals well meet four different species of babies that are being raised by humans and who have surrogate families.

programme.title: Evolution Earth 1 - Earth Ep1
programme.desc: Travel to the ends of the Earth, where a drama is unfolding in real time. Meet animals, from tiny butterflies to huge humpback whales, that are acting as sentinels, adapting their behaviour, and helping us unlock the riddles of our changing planet.

programme.title: Evolution Earth 1 - Islands Ep2
programme.desc: Find out why islands are like mini-Earths where evolution happens before your eyes. Journey from the Galpagos to Antarctica to see how sea lions, finches, crickets, monkeys and other wildlife are finding surprising solutions to climatic problems.

programme.title: Evolution Earth 1 - Heat Ep3
programme.desc: Go to extremes, from the Sahara to the outback, where animals are teaching us how to survive in our heating world. Shelter in caves with chimps, see camels sip salt water, and listen as zebra finches sing to their eggs to make their chicks smaller.

programme.title: Evolution Earth 1 - Ice Ep4
programme.desc: Trek to the planets quickly melting poles, where animals are giving scientists clues about our future existence. Learn how the movements of polar bears, penguins, and other arctic creatures could help humans map (and prevent) global warming.

programme.title: Kingdom of the Tide
programme.desc: Low tide exposes a band of shore called the intertidal zone. Its a place of stunning extremes, attacked by hurricane force waves and exposed to baking heat. Creatures here have evolved in countless bizarre ways. Scientists explore this alien realm.

programme.title: Planet Shark 1 - Ultimate Predator Ep1
programme.desc: Stalk the seas with sharks as they hunt using heightened senses and killer instincts. Watch a whitetip reef shark put its electrical sensors to work finding its preys heartbeat, and the pelagic thresher shark stun its quarry with its whiplike tail.

programme.title: Attack and Defend 1 - Masters of Defence Ep5
programme.desc: Staying alive is job one for these masters of defence. With clever adaptations like mimicry and poison on their side, they continue to outwit predators.

programme.title: Baby Animals 2 - Herd Mentality Ep2
programme.desc: Many species of animals are adapted to live in large groups. The group gives them protection from predators, helps them find food and offers plenty of social contact. In this episode of Baby Animals we explore whats it like to grow up in some of these groups.

programme.title: Land of Primates 1 - Lemurs of Madagascar Ep2
programme.desc: The island is the land of Lemurs. Lemurs are fascinating arboreal primitive primates of Madagascar represented in all sizes, colors, and shapes from the largest Indri to the tiny mouse lemur.

programme.title: Land of Primates 1 - Baboons of Bambelela Ep4
programme.desc: With power in numbers, adaptability and intelligent leadership, the Bambelela baboon troop is an excellent example of why baboons thrive throughout Africa. Their highly refined social behavior and organization mirror much of human society and show just how alike we are to our primate cousins.

programme.title: Land of Primates 1 - Baboon Lagoon Ep6
programme.desc: Enter the wilds of South Africa to get an intimate look into one of the continents most misunderstood primates. Like humans, these primates have unique personalities and share strong bonds with their families and friends.

programme.title: Land of Primates 1 - Zanzibar's Poison Monkey Ep8
programme.desc: Off the coast of Tanzania, baby Kima lives with his family of red Colobus monkeys. But what happens when he loses his way? Discover how this little monkey learns to adapt to life in the jungleand find out if he can reconnect with his family again.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Sammi, Rose, and Casey Ep1
programme.desc: Roam across America with a road-tripping chicken and meet a mouse family living in an English garden. Beat arachnophobia with a spiders help, trek with the guardian of Earths last two northern white rhinos, and celebrate more interspecies pals.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Bandit, Max, and George Ep2
programme.desc: Learn how cockatoos and platypuses inspired new careers, then explore the shared trauma that bonded a human and an elephant for life. Get playful with 35-year-old George the turkey vulture and say a moving farewell to human-raised kangaroos.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Spud, Digger, and Tommy Ep3
programme.desc: Explore the Tasmanian Devils softer side, meet a pioneering sea turtle, and enjoy family dinner with Buttons the deer. Play football with 800-kilogram Spud the bull and learn how Digger the owl soothed conservationist Nigel during his cancer treatment.

programme.title: Animals Like Us 1 - A Penguin Proposal Ep1
programme.desc: Watch an Antarctic gentoo penguin pop the question with a rocky token of his devotion, then learn how a Madagascar lemur uses toxic millipedes for pest control. Bone up on makeup techniques with a flamingo and meet a honey badger that can pick locks.

programme.title: Planet Shark 1 - Ocean Voyagers Ep2
programme.desc: Navigate the oceans vast distances, depths, and darkness with nomadic sharks that thrive in the blue emptiness. Meet a lone blue shark traversing stormy Atlantic seas, and hundreds of hammerheads returning to their Pacific island breeding ground.

programme.title: Planet Shark 1 - In the Extreme Ep3
programme.desc: Follow a host of sharks with extraordinary abilities that allow them to thrive in the most adverse conditions around the globe. Observe nearly blind Greenland sharks made for life in freezing Arctic waters, and another species that can walk on land.

programme.title: Attack and Defend 1 - Masters of Defence Ep5
programme.desc: Staying alive is job one for these masters of defence. With clever adaptations like mimicry and poison on their side, they continue to outwit predators.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep4
programme.desc: Show Dog, Show \ Keys to Victory - Tag can't wait to show off her car at the car show. But when Cheddar Biscuit wants to come along and pick up her clown friends along the way, Tag is wary that Cheddar Biscuit will steal her thunder. \ The Not Yet Cadets can't wait to watch Sams big race. But when Sam loses his car key, he challenges the Not Yet Cadets to race around town to find it.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep30
programme.desc: The Case Of The Popping Balloons - Noddy and his friends are each given a balloon at the end of Smartysaurus's Science Party. But when lots of the balloons start going pop, Noddy decides to investigate why. Realising that someone must be hiding and popping them, he follows the clues to PatPat and then to the Naughticorns before eventually working out that the balloon poppers are the Ninjas. They've been playing their favourite game: Ninja-Balloon-Pop! Noddy helps them to see that while they were having fun, everyone else was getting upset. Back at the Dino-Lab, the Ninjas apologise and this time everyone happily joins in with a game of Ninja-Balloon-Pop. Case closed! Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep30
programme.desc: Boing Boing - Raa Raa has got a new pogo stick. He is having a great time bouncing around, but his friends aren't so sure he seems to be causing rather a lot of damage. Is there any way Raa Raa can practise without destroying their jungle home?

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep40
programme.desc: Gibraltar ROCKS! - When Wally and Wenda head to WWS Great Magic Key Vault, located in Gibraltar, to find Whitebeard a key for his birthday, they find that Odlulu has already cleaned out the vault; the Wanderers must round up all these keys, and theyll have to do it in time for Whitebeards surprise birthday party.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep40
programme.desc: Party Poopers/The League - The FAST crew's vacation is threatened by hard-partying toilet frogs. The Crew quits racing when they become obsessed with a fantasy racing league.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep40
programme.desc: Pteracopters - When Pteracopterscrash land in the Flatirons, Ty and crew must go behind enemy lines to save their fallen wingman from savage STEALTH SCRAPADACTYLS

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep40
programme.desc: Friend Like Tip / Like Mother, Like Pit Of Fire - Tip meets a surprisingly similar girl which threatens Tip's uniqueness/ When Tip and Die-Anne refuse to "be like their moms", they end up finding themselves in a dangerous situation

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep7
programme.desc: Lucky And The Cowboy Next Door - When the annual roundup and town dance brings cowboy Javier to Miradero Lucky finds a new friend who can teach her and Spirit a new trick.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep8
programme.desc: Lucky And The Pie P.I. - Mysteries collide when horse thieves strike Miradero at the same time as a pie thief strikes the church bake sale while the adults try to keep the horse thieves at bay Lucky is determined to find out who stole the pies.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep29
programme.desc: Gorgey Girl / A Gran Adventure - Eep has the first pen pal in Gulp Gorge/Gran sends Ugga and Eep on the first treasure hunt when she decides to pass on her inheritance

Their goal is to make the school extremely difficult by replacing all the teachers with Teachertron robots. Suffering under the new regime and without Mr. Krupp/Captain Underpants on hand to help, the boys hypnotize gym teacher Mr. Meaner and turn him into Sergeant Boxers to fight back.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep15
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Frantic Fury of the Fearsome Furculees - Tired of the Melvins ruling the school, the boys realize that they need Mr. Krupp to make the school at least bearable. Unfortunately, Krupp has run off to Ecuador to look for a fabled fountain. So the boys form the M.I.S.F.A.R.T.S. - Mega Incredible Search Force Adventure Rescue Team Squad - to travel to Ecuador and bring Krupp back, whether he wants it or not.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep17
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Preposterous Pulverizing of the Pestering Poopacabra - In hopes of raising their grades so they can go to Lake Summer Camp, George and Harold must teach Ratrick, their assigned rat, a simple task. But Ratrick runs away into the sewers where he is doused with toxic waste and transformed into Poopacabra! It's now up to the boys and Captain Underpants to stop the beast before it takes over Piqua with its stench, and more importantly, ruins the boys' chances to go to Lake Summer Camp.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep18
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Dastardlys Deed of the Devious Diddlysaurus - George and Harold decide to do an extra credit project on dinosaurs to help their chances of getting summer camp-worthy grades. When Melvin brings in a dinosaur frozen in ice, the boys try to get rid of it. But the ice thaws and they meet Diddlysaurus, a prankster raptor who's huge fans of the boys. He offers to help them with their project if he can pull pranks with them, but when the pranks go too far, the boys and Captain Underpants have to deal with the dino.
